sample.title: [PDE-472] Add tweaks based on new mocks for configuring Godzilla Test…
sample.body: … Data ## Description Updates the look and copy of Test Data based on [new mocks](https://zapier.invisionapp.com/boards/SA3RH889XYZ/). The behavior is slightly different in that fields in the Pretty view are disabled and synced with Input Fields. There are also a couple tweaks to the Godzilla TextInput so that our specificity overrides the default TextInput. Disabled styles now match Formatic disabled styles. ## Type of Changes | | Type | | ------------- | ------------- | | ✓ | :bug: Bug fix | | ✓ | :hammer: Refactoring | ## Related Issue https://zapierorg.atlassian.net/browse/PDE-472 ## Before / Current Behavior Test Data pretty fields worked like regular ol' KeyValues. ## After / New Behavior No Input Fields: ![](https://zappy.zapier.com/25EC1F69-E8B8-474E-ACDB-B4ECA2F30FE9.png) ## Testing Steps / QA Criteria 1. Go to a Godzilla App. 2. Make sure you have at least one input field 3. Go to API Config 4. Go to Test Request. There should only be request fields for the input fields you have defined. ## TODOs * [ ] Add tests * [ ] Test on Review Lab and identify any regressions * [ ] Address any potential security concerns * [ ] Add the `needs-review` label (and `backend`/`frontend` or other labels as necessary). * [ ] Run an a11y audit using the [aXe Chrome extension](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/axe/lhdoppojpmngadmnindnejefpokejbdd) * [ ] Test in [supported browsers](https://zapier.quip.com/Cv3YAivNbIj4#EeDACAvCsPL) and [at different screen sizes](https://zapier.quip.com/Cv3YAivNbIj4#EeDACAXkNBe)
